answers.answer: Why do you have chronic pancreatitis?....there was release from the press several months back that pop causes pancreatic cancer...  Check your diet.  Watch the show 'Know the Cause' or go to their website (poorly formated but you can watch the show there).  If you do have diatbetes, stay away from Sucralose (Splenda), Aspertame and other sugar substitutes....all are deadly.  Use stevia / honey instead.  Research Alpha Lipoic Acid and banaba leaf...both natural supplements that regulate sugars.
